name: Shining Stars 4: Another Dimensional Incident
summary: Shining Stars 4: Another Dimensional Incident is a light kaizo mod continuing, and ending, the story line of SM64 Shining Stars. Star Whomp and Celestial Bowser team up to cause all kinds of alternate dimensional chaos with the 152nd Star Comet, and we must stop them!
